1.0.0.name: wordpress/featured-box
1.0.0.description:
Featured Box is a very simple Wordpress plugin that provides featured image slider for your blog. Featured Box automatically adjusts the slider size based on the images available in your library. Plugin has few configuration options like transition type and speed control, image display duration.

You can help us to improve Featured Box by suggesting new features or report existing bugs here. We appreciate any help!

Become our Facebook fan to keep up with the latest updates. You can also find us on Google+ circles here.

ENJOY!
